snippet.title: Grind Stormer | Full Game | No Commentary
snippet.description:
#GrindStormer #Gaming #Walkthrough #NoCommentary #Gameplay #letsplay

Grind Stormer, aka V・V, is a vertically scrolling manic shooter with gorgeous pixel art graphics and an upbeat FM soundtrack. Developed by an all-star team at the legendary Japanese studio Toaplan, known for their stellar shoot ‘em ups.

If you liked what you saw, hit that subscribe button to show some love to my channel! Don't forget to give the video a thumbs up if it brought you joy. Feel free to drop a comment below about anything you'd like to share, or suggest a game you'd like me to explore and feature on the channel. I appreciate your support and hope you enjoy the content. Thanks for tuning in!

PC Hardware Specifications System Build Information
GPU: PowerColor Red Devil AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT 12GB
CPU: AMD Ryzen 9 5900X 12-Core Processor
RAM: DDR4 64GB 3600MHz
SSD: Samsung 980 500 GB
OS: Windows 11 (Latest Stable Build)

Recorded, Encoded/Rendered At 60fps with Filmora 13

GENRE: Action
DEVELOPER: Bitwave Games, Toaplan
PUBLISHER: Bitwave Games
FRANCHISE: Toaplan Arcade Collection
RELEASE DATE: 8 Apr, 2024

twitter.com/TheSaltyDemon
steamcommunity.com/groups/SaltyDemon
